items.label: Maths
items.details: One-on-one lessons covering fractions, decimals, early algebra, problem solving and numeracy skills. Perfect for building confidence.

items.label: Science
items.details: Hands-on explanations of basic biology, chemistry and physics concepts tailored to the school curriculum.

items.label: Maths
items.details: Targeted lessons for SACE / HSC level topics with worked examples, exam technique and practice material.

items.label: Chemistry
items.details: Structured lessons covering theoretical and practical chemistry concepts, problem solving and assessment preparation.

items.label: Physics
items.details: Clear explanations and worked problems for key physics topics, with emphasis on conceptual understanding and exam-style problems.

items.label: 1st Year Chemistry
items.details: Support for first year chemistry topics including general chemistry, analytical methods and laboratory technique.

items.label: 2nd Year Organic Chemistry
items.details: Focused tuition on organic chemistry, reaction mechanisms, spectroscopy and problem solving at second-year level.

items.label: University Bridging
items.details: Bridging courses to prepare students for university-level STEM subjects: tailored lessons to shore up maths and science foundations.
